799 real, intent(in):: dt, factor

952 enddo
953 enddo

978 ✗ subroutine ps_bias_correction ( ps_dt, is, ie, js, je, isd, ied, jsd, jed, area )
979 integer, intent(IN) :: is, ie, js, je
980 integer, intent(IN) :: isd, ied, jsd,jed
981 real, intent(inout):: ps_dt(is:ie,js:je)
982 real, intent(IN), dimension(isd:ied,jsd:jed) :: area
983 !
984 ✗ real:: esl, total_area
985 ✗ real:: bias, psum
986 ✗ integer:: i, j
987
988 ✗ total_area = 4.*pi*radius**2
989 ✗ esl = 0.01 ! Pascal
990
991 ✗ bias = g0_sum(ps_dt, is, ie, js, je, 1, .true., isd, ied, jsd, jed, area)
992
993 ✗ if ( abs(bias) < esl ) then
994 ✗ if(master .and. nudge_debug) write(*,*) 'Very small PS bias=', -bias, ' No bais adjustment'
995 ✗ return
996 else
997 ✗ if(master .and. nudge_debug) write(*,*) 'Significant PS bias=', -bias
998 endif
999
1000 ✗ if ( bias > 0. ) then
1001 ✗ psum = 0.
1002 ✗ do j=js,je
1003 ✗ do i=is,ie
1004 ✗ if ( ps_dt(i,j) > 0. ) then
1005 ✗ psum = psum + area(i,j)
1006 endif
1007 enddo
1008 enddo
1009
1010 ✗ call mp_reduce_sum( psum )
1011 ✗ bias = bias * total_area / psum
1012
1013 ✗ do j=js,je
1014 ✗ do i=is,ie
1015 ✗ if ( ps_dt(i,j) > 0.0 ) then
1016 ✗ ps_dt(i,j) = max(0.0, ps_dt(i,j) - bias)
1017 endif
1018 enddo
1019 enddo
1020 else
1021 ✗ psum = 0.
1022 ✗ do j=js,je
1023 ✗ do i=is,ie
1024 ✗ if ( ps_dt(i,j) < 0. ) then
1025 ✗ psum = psum + area(i,j)
1026 endif
1027 enddo
1028 enddo
1029
1030 ✗ call mp_reduce_sum( psum )
1031 ✗ bias = bias * total_area / psum
1032
1033 ✗ do j=js,je
1034 ✗ do i=is,ie
1035 ✗ if ( ps_dt(i,j) < 0.0 ) then
1036 ✗ ps_dt(i,j) = min(0.0, ps_dt(i,j) - bias)
1037 endif
1038 enddo
1039 enddo
1040 endif
1041
1042 end subroutine ps_bias_correction

1044 !>@brief Fast version of global sum that is reproduced
1045 !! if the result is rounded to 4-byte
1046 ✗ real function g0_sum(p, ifirst, ilast, jfirst, jlast, mode, reproduce, isd, ied, jsd, jed, area)
1047 ! Fast version of global sum; reproduced if result rounded to 4-byte

1734 ✗ subroutine remap_coef(agrid)
1735
1736 real, intent(IN), dimension(isd:ied,jsd:jed,2) :: agrid
1737
1738 ! local:
1739 ✗ real :: rdlon(im)
1740 ✗ real :: rdlat(jm)
1741 ✗ real:: a1, b1
1742 ✗ integer i,j, i1, i2, jc, i0, j0
1743
1744 ✗ do i=1,im-1
1745 ✗ rdlon(i) = 1. / (lon(i+1) - lon(i))
1746 enddo
1747 ✗ rdlon(im) = 1. / (lon(1) + 2.*pi - lon(im))
1748
1749 ✗ do j=1,jm-1
1750 ✗ rdlat(j) = 1. / (lat(j+1) - lat(j))
1751 enddo
1752
1753 ! * Interpolate to cubed sphere cell center
1754 ✗ do 5000 j=js,je
1755
1756 ✗ do i=is,ie
1757
1758 ✗ if ( agrid(i,j,1)>lon(im) ) then
1759 ✗ i1 = im; i2 = 1
1760 ✗ a1 = (agrid(i,j,1)-lon(im)) * rdlon(im)
1761 ✗ elseif ( agrid(i,j,1)<lon(1) ) then
1762 ✗ i1 = im; i2 = 1
1763 ✗ a1 = (agrid(i,j,1)+2.*pi-lon(im)) * rdlon(im)
1764 else
1765 ✗ do i0=1,im-1
1766 ✗ if ( agrid(i,j,1)>=lon(i0) .and. agrid(i,j,1)<=lon(i0+1) ) then
1767 ✗ i1 = i0; i2 = i0+1
1768 ✗ a1 = (agrid(i,j,1)-lon(i1)) * rdlon(i0)
1769 ✗ go to 111
1770 endif
1771 enddo
1772 endif
1773 111 continue
1774
1775 ✗ if ( agrid(i,j,2)<lat(1) ) then
1776 ✗ jc = 1
1777 ✗ b1 = 0.
1778 ✗ elseif ( agrid(i,j,2)>lat(jm) ) then
1779 ✗ jc = jm-1
1780 ✗ b1 = 1.
1781 else
1782 ✗ do j0=1,jm-1
1783 ✗ if ( agrid(i,j,2)>=lat(j0) .and. agrid(i,j,2)<=lat(j0+1) ) then
1784 ✗ jc = j0
1785 ✗ b1 = (agrid(i,j,2)-lat(jc)) * rdlat(jc)
1786 ✗ go to 222
1787 endif
1788 enddo
1789 endif
1790 222 continue
1791
1792 ✗ if ( a1<0.0 .or. a1>1.0 .or. b1<0.0 .or. b1>1.0 ) then
1793 ✗ write(*,*) 'gid=', mpp_pe(), i,j,a1, b1
1794 endif
1795
1796 ✗ s2c(i,j,1) = (1.-a1) * (1.-b1)
1797 ✗ s2c(i,j,2) = a1 * (1.-b1)
1798 ✗ s2c(i,j,3) = a1 * b1
1799 ✗ s2c(i,j,4) = (1.-a1) * b1
1800 ✗ id1(i,j) = i1
1801 ✗ id2(i,j) = i2
1802 ✗ jdc(i,j) = jc
1803 enddo !i-loop
1804 ✗ 5000 continue ! j-loop
1805
1806 ✗ end subroutine remap_coef

1810 ✗ subroutine ncep2fms( sst )
1811 real(kind=4), intent(in):: sst(im,jm)
1812 ! local:
1813 ✗ real :: rdlon(im)
1814 ✗ real :: rdlat(jm)
1815 ✗ real:: a1, b1
1816 ✗ real:: delx, dely
1817 ✗ real:: xc, yc ! "data" location
1818 ✗ real:: c1, c2, c3, c4
1819 ✗ integer i,j, i1, i2, jc, i0, j0, it, jt
1820
1821 ✗ do i=1,im-1
1822 ✗ rdlon(i) = 1. / (lon(i+1) - lon(i))
1823 enddo
1824 ✗ rdlon(im) = 1. / (lon(1) + 2.*pi - lon(im))
1825
1826 ✗ do j=1,jm-1
1827 ✗ rdlat(j) = 1. / (lat(j+1) - lat(j))
1828 enddo
1829
1830 ! * Interpolate to "FMS" 1x1 SST data grid
1831 ! lon: 0.5, 1.5, ..., 359.5
1832 ! lat: -89.5, -88.5, ... , 88.5, 89.5
1833
1834 ✗ delx = 360./real(i_sst)
1835 ✗ dely = 180./real(j_sst)
1836
1837 ✗ jt = 1
1838 ✗ do 5000 j=1,j_sst
1839
1840 ✗ yc = (-90. + dely * (0.5+real(j-1))) * deg2rad
1841 ✗ if ( yc<lat(1) ) then
1842 ✗ jc = 1
1843 ✗ b1 = 0.
1844 ✗ elseif ( yc>lat(jm) ) then
1845 ✗ jc = jm-1
1846 ✗ b1 = 1.
1847 else
1848 ✗ do j0=jt,jm-1
1849 ✗ if ( yc>=lat(j0) .and. yc<=lat(j0+1) ) then
1850 ✗ jc = j0
1851 ✗ jt = j0
1852 ✗ b1 = (yc-lat(jc)) * rdlat(jc)
1853 ✗ go to 222
1854 endif
1855 enddo
1856 endif
1857 222 continue
1858 ✗ it = 1
1859
1860 ✗ do i=1,i_sst
1861 ✗ xc = delx * (0.5+real(i-1)) * deg2rad
1862 ✗ if ( xc>lon(im) ) then
1863 ✗ i1 = im; i2 = 1
1864 ✗ a1 = (xc-lon(im)) * rdlon(im)
1865 ✗ elseif ( xc<lon(1) ) then
1866 ✗ i1 = im; i2 = 1
1867 ✗ a1 = (xc+2.*pi-lon(im)) * rdlon(im)
1868 else
1869 ✗ do i0=it,im-1
1870 ✗ if ( xc>=lon(i0) .and. xc<=lon(i0+1) ) then
1871 ✗ i1 = i0; i2 = i0+1
1872 ✗ it = i0
1873 ✗ a1 = (xc-lon(i1)) * rdlon(i0)
1874 ✗ go to 111
1875 endif
1876 enddo
1877 endif
1878 111 continue
1879
1880 ! if ( a1<0.0 .or. a1>1.0 .or. b1<0.0 .or. b1>1.0 ) then
1881 ! write(*,*) 'gid=', mpp_pe(), i,j,a1, b1
1882 ! endif
1883 ✗ c1 = (1.-a1) * (1.-b1)
1884 ✗ c2 = a1 * (1.-b1)
1885 ✗ c3 = a1 * b1
1886 ✗ c4 = (1.-a1) * b1
1887 ! Interpolated surface pressure
1888 ✗ sst_ncep(i,j) = c1*sst(i1,jc ) + c2*sst(i2,jc ) + &
1889 ✗ c3*sst(i2,jc+1) + c4*sst(i1,jc+1)
1890 enddo !i-loop
1891 ✗ 5000 continue ! j-loop
1892
1893 ✗ end subroutine ncep2fms
1894 #endif

3503 ✗ subroutine del2_uv(du, dv, cd, kmd, ntimes, bd, npx, npy, gridstruct, domain)
3504 integer, intent(in):: kmd
3505 integer, intent(in):: ntimes
3506 real, intent(in):: cd !< cd = K * da_min; 0 < K < 0.25
3507 type(fv_grid_bounds_type), intent(IN) :: bd

3515 ✗ integer i,j,k

3517 ✗ vlon => gridstruct%vlon
3518 ✗ vlat => gridstruct%vlat

3522 ✗ do k=1,kmd
3523 ✗ do j=js,je
3524 ✗ do i=is,ie
3525 ✗ v1(i,j,k) = du(i,j,k)*vlon(i,j,1) + dv(i,j,k)*vlat(i,j,1)
3526 ✗ v2(i,j,k) = du(i,j,k)*vlon(i,j,2) + dv(i,j,k)*vlat(i,j,2)
3527 ✗ v3(i,j,k) = du(i,j,k)*vlon(i,j,3) + dv(i,j,k)*vlat(i,j,3)
3528 enddo
3529 enddo

3533 ✗ call del2_scalar( v1(is,js,1), cd, kmd, ntimes, bd, npx, npy, gridstruct, domain )
3534 ✗ call del2_scalar( v2(is,js,1), cd, kmd, ntimes, bd, npx, npy, gridstruct, domain )
3535 ✗ call del2_scalar( v3(is,js,1), cd, kmd, ntimes, bd, npx, npy, gridstruct, domain )

3543 ✗ dv(i,j,k) = v1(i,j,k)*vlat(i,j,1) + v2(i,j,k)*vlat(i,j,2) + v3(i,j,k)*vlat(i,j,3)
